description: Interprets natural language system monitoring requests, translates them into appropriate shell/system commands (ps, top, df, env, netstat, uptime, free, etc.), validates commands are read-only and safe, and returns structured formatted results. Refuses destructive operations (rm, kill, shutdown, etc.) with clear warnings.

example_response.category: Command category: process, memory, disk, network, system, environment, logs, or blocked
example_response.result_type: How to render the result: table, progress_bar, text, or blocked
example_response.result: The command output or structured data as a string
example_response.blocked_reason: Reason the command was blocked, or empty string if not blocked
